nested_items.name: AppInstanceBot
nested_items.description: The detials of the AppInstanceBot.

nested_items.name: AppInstanceBotArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the AppInstanceBot.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the AppInstanceBot.

nested_items.name: Configuration
nested_items.description: The data processing instructions for an AppInstanceBot.

nested_items.name: RespondsTo
nested_items.description: Determines whether the Amazon Lex V2 bot responds to all standard messages. Control messages are not supported.

nested_items.name: InvokedBy
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of message that triggers a bot.

nested_items.name: StandardMessages
nested_items.description: Sets standard messages as the bot trigger. For standard messages:
ALL: The bot processes all standard messages.
AUTO: The bot responds to ALL messages when the channel has one other non-hidden member, and responds to MENTIONS when the channel has more than one other non-hidden member.
MENTIONS: The bot processes all standard messages that have a message attribute with CHIME.mentions and a value of the bot ARN.
NONE: The bot processes no standard messages.

nested_items.name: TargetedMessages
nested_items.description: Sets targeted messages as the bot trigger. For targeted messages:
ALL: The bot processes all TargetedMessages sent to it. The bot then responds with a targeted message back to the sender.
NONE: The bot processes no targeted messages.

nested_items.name: LexBotAliasArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon Lex V2 bot's alias. The ARN uses this format: arn:aws:lex:REGION:ACCOUNT:bot-alias/MYBOTID/MYBOTALIAS.

nested_items.name: LocaleId
nested_items.description: Identifies the Amazon Lex V2 bot's language and locale. The string must match one of the supported locales in Amazon Lex V2. All of the intents, slot types, and slots used in the bot must have the same locale. For more information, see Supported languages in the Amazon Lex V2 Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: WelcomeIntent
nested_items.description: The name of the welcome intent configured in the Amazon Lex V2 bot.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the AppInstanceBot was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the AppInstanceBot was last updated.

nested_items.name: Metadata
nested_items.description: The metadata for an AppInstanceBot.
